questions.question: The changes in battery capacity of Apple, Google and IQOO over the past five years

answer.value:
The battery capacity of Apple's products initially decreased but then increased which reached its peak in 2020.
  The data of Google fluctuated and rose sharply, eventually reaching nearly 5,000.
  IQOO's battery was absolutely no change and both of them over 8000

key_insights: All the data can be clearly seen and understood at a glance now.

reasoning.reasoning: It is convenient for comparing the data of the company from year to year.
